message: Welcome! I'm offering a unique product for $1000000. While it's not guaranteed to be of high quality, my records show that approximately one-third of the products I've offered have been of high quality. If you're interested, let me know and we can proceed with the sale. Please remember, once purchased, there are no refunds.
I'd like to take a chance on your product. I'm willing to take the risk and see if it's high-quality.

Our last buyer took a risk and was satisfied with their decision. Would you like to join them? Please note, all sales are final.
